name: bj-ablssgrp

body.origin:
|- wss(cabl, cgrp)
-| wceq(cabl, cin(cgrp, ccmn))
-| wss(cin(cgrp, ccmn), cgrp)
body.pretty:
⊢ Abel ⊆ Grp
⊣ Abel =(Grp ⋂ CMnd)
⊣ (Grp ⋂ CMnd)⊆ Grp

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cabl, cgrp)
-| wceq(cabl, cin(cgrp, ccmn))
-| wss(cin(cgrp, ccmn), cgrp)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Abel ⊆ Grp
⊣ Abel =(Grp ⋂ CMnd)
⊣ (Grp ⋂ CMnd)⊆ Grp

comment: Abelian groups are groups. (Contributed by BJ, 9-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
